author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Closed Alpha Playtest Announcement Trailer for Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game (working title), an upcoming action fighting game based on the beloved Avatar franchise, developed by Gameplay Group International in collaboration with Paramount. Take a look at the latest trailer to see new gameplay for Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game, leading up to the Closed Alpha Playtest. Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game is coming soon for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

Wishlist the game here on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2424420/Avatar_Legends_The_Fighting_Game/

For more updates, follow the official channels below:

https://x.com/avatar_fighters 
https://www.instagram.com/avatar_fighters/ 
https://www.youtube.com/@Avatar_Fighters
https://www.tiktok.com/@avatar_fighters
https://bsky.app/profile/avatarfighters.bsky.social

#AvatarLegendsTheFightingGame #Gaming #IGN
title: Avatar Legends: The Fighting Game - Official Closed Alpha Playtest Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join members of the development team at Fumi Games for a deep dive look at Mouse P.I. For Hire in this documentary for the upcoming first-person shooter game. Go behind the scenes with the developers on how they brought the game to life, including a closer look at the game's hand-crafted animations, its lively world, protagonist, the noir detective story, combat, and more. Mouse: P.I. For Hire will be available on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) on March 19, 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire - Official Deep Dive Documentary | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay and objectives of Task Time in this new trailer for the upcoming Gameshow-inspired competitive party game. In Task Time, eight friends dive headfirst into six rounds of unpredictable tasks and physics-fuelled chaos, to finish top of the leaderboard. From (some of) the people who worked on Gang Beasts and Fall Guys, this is your new favourite friendslop. Task Time is coming soon to Xbox and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Task Time - Official Overview Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at gameplay, cards, and the thrill of competition and collecting in this TCG Card Shop Simulator trailer for the upcoming sim game. TCG Card Shop Simulator will be available on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, and Xbox Play Anywhere in Q1 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: TCG Card Shop Simulator - Official Gameplay Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Xbox Announcement Trailer for Over the Hill, an adventure driving off-roading game developed by Funselektor Labs and Strelka Games. Players will overcome challenging roads alone or with friends across sprawling landscapes with classic vehicles from the 60s to 80s. Over the Hill is coming soon to Xbox Series X|S alongside PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Over the Hill - Official Xbox Announcement Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
This game is hard-boiled. Get a fresh look at gameplay from Egging On in this trailer for the upcoming precision platformer game. Face the challenge of being a real, fragile egg. Escape the hen-house and jump, roll and climb your way through a farm shop, factory and other perilous environments. With some determination, you might just reach your freedom. Egging On will be available on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Steam on November 6, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Egging On - Official Release Date Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Watch the trailer to see gameplay and more from three games from publisher Raw Fury, including Monsters Are Coming: Rock & Road, Routine, and Dome Keeper. 

Monsters are Coming: Rock & Road is a tower-survivor rogue-lite, where you protect an ever-moving city from unrelenting hordes. Gather resources, fortify defenses, and boost potential through enhanced player progression. Will you reach the Arch? Monsters are Coming: Rock & Road will be available on Game Pass, Xbox PC, and Xbox Cloud on November 20, 2025. It is also coming to Xbox in 2026, available on Day One with Xbox Game Pass.

In Dome Keeper, defend against waves of alien monsters in this unique roguelike action miner. Dig for resources, collect useful gadgets, and upgrade equipment to increase odds of survival – just hurry back before your dome is destroyed! Dome Keeper will be available on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, and Xbox Cloud on December 9, 2025.

Get another look at Routine, a first-person sci-fi horror
title: Raw Fury - Official Sizzle Reel Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Robot & Monster Girl Reveal Trailer for Invincible VS, an upcoming action fighting game developed by Quarter Up. Players can turn the tides of battle with Monster Girl's heavy attacks coupled with Robot's quick and precise blows against any opponent. Play as Robot and Monster Girl in Invincible VS, coming soon in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Invincible VS - Official Robot & Monster Girl Reveal Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Hit the slopes and get a fresh look at Sledding Game in this latest trailer for the upcoming game about sledding and hanging out with friends. Learn about ragdoll physics gameplay, relaxing mini-games, and more from Sledding Game ahead of its launch on PC, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox PC. It is also coming Day One with Game Pass.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Sledding Game - Official Xbox Announce Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Superball is a multiplayer 3v3 action game that's available to play now on Xbox and PC. Watch the Superball launch trailer to see action, gameplay, and more. Superball is an all-out blast of football in a cyberpunk setting. Choose a hero with unique abilities and conquer the sport of the future. Your accurate passes and strikes, as well as artful defense will lead your team to victory!

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Superball - Official Launch Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest DayZ: Badlands trailer for another look at this upcoming DLC, which brings a new desert-themed map to the online co-op zombie survival sandbox adventure game. In the blistering heat of Nasdara province - a sun-scorched expanse of cracked soil and shifting sands – you’ll fight to survive as one of the last stragglers in a wasteland that was ravaged by endless warfare even before the outbreak of infected. Survival isn’t just measured in the drops of water you save here, but in the bullets you spare. The DayZ: Badlands expansion is coming to Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Series X/S.

Explore the largest map for the official DayZ: 267km² of vast, desert-themed wasteland that’s located west of Chernarus and borders Takistan’s western frontier. To the east, the sands creep inward, while jagged border mountains split the lands to the west. This fully inland territory is a scarred battleground with stories to tell.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: DayZ: Badlands - Official Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Ante Chamber and 1.14 Update Launch Trailer for Vampire Survivors, the hit top-down auto battler roguelike game developed by Poncle. Players can take to the game in an all new way with the latest Balatro-centric collab with Ante Chamber. Traverse the play space with Jokers galore with the Ante Chamber and 1.14 Update for Vampire Survivors, available now.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Vampire Survivors - Official Ante Chamber & 1.14 Update Launch Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Ultros, Sorry We're Closed, Plucky Squire, and a whole lot more indie games from creators around the world take the spotlight in this Indie Selects trailer. Check it out for a peek at action, horror, adventure, and the wonderful, whimsical worlds you can explore!

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Indie Selects - Official Sizzle Reel Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Stranded on a frozen planet, astronaut Ariane must brave rugged landscapes and shifting realities to rescue her wounded partner, Thomas. Watch the tense new Aphelion trailer for this upcoming action-packed sci-fi adventure that blends exploration, traversal, and tense stealth gameplay. Meet the characters in this latest Aphelion trailer, learn about the story, and see the deadly threats that await you. Aphelion will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PC, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, Xbox Play Anywhere, Xbox Game Pass, and Xbox Cloud in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Aphelion - Official Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Ungodly in this trailer for the upcoming dark fantasy RPG from the creator of Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes. Learn about the story, the dangerous world, see brutal gameplay, and more in this trailer. Ungodly will be available on Xbox Series X/S and Xbox PC in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Ungodly - Official Xbox Announce Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Join the game directors of Planet of Lana 2 from developer Wishfully for an extended look at gameplay from the upcoming puzzle platformer game sequel. Learn about new biomes you can explore and take a closer look at the ocean environment in this new Planet of Lana 2 trailer. See how you can control your companion, Mui, and her abilities. We also learn about new creatures, stealth gameplay, the expanded narrative, and how the planet has changed as we get a glimpse at the story. Planet of Lana 2: Children of the Leaf will be available on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox Cloud, and PC in 2026, as well as Xbox Game Pass on Day One.

In Planet of Lana 2, after saving their planet from an invading Robot army, Lana and Mui continue to uncover its mysterious past. Pass through icy mountains, deep oceans and forgotten ruins in this cinematic puzzle adventure. Unravel a deeper, longer story, tougher challenges, and an
title: Planet of Lana 2 - Official Developer Gameplay Deep Dive | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Awaysis trailer for this dungeon brawler game to see gameplay, strange characters, its world, and more. Awaysis is a physics-fueled throwdown where you’ll jump, slide, and collide on your adventure to restore peace to the Awaysis - an ancient floating relic under attack by forces of great darkness! Awaysis will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, Xbox Play Anywhere, and Xbox Game Pass.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Awaysis - Official Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
The co-op action-roguelike for 33 players, 33 Immortals, gets a new trailer showcasing the announcement of the Pride and Temperance update. The Pride and Temperance update features new weapons, including the Glaive of Temperance and the Crossbows of Pride. Ordeals have been added to bring greater challenges, along with new Chamber objectives. The new 33 Immortals trailer gives a detailed breakdown of the Pride and Temperance update, so be sure to check it out.

The Pride and Temperance update for 33 Immortals is available today, October 28, on Xbox Series X/S, Xbox PC, and Xbox Cloud.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: 33 Immortals: The Pride and Temperance Update - Official Launch Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to the Doggie Underworld. Here's your look at the Puppergeist announcement trailer for this upcoming heartfelt rhythm and visual novel adventure about kindness, compassion, and the pets we hold dear. Join the witch Claire on a journey to find her missing pup! In Puppergeist, help doggie spirits through rhythm-based mini-games, uncover touching stories of love and loss, and discover why your Pup was sent to the underworld in the first place. Puppergeist will be available on Xbox.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Puppergeist - Official Announcement Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Don't! Fret is a stylized first-person psychological mascot-horror game set in a musically themed world. Play as a guitar named Fret to solve puzzles, escape from foes, and uncover the mystery behind Harmonic Heights. Watch the Don't! Fret trailer to see puzzles, gameplay, and its nightmarish world. The trailer also reveals Don't! Fret's voice cast, including Amanda Hufford, Cami Cat, CG5, ChewieCatt, DaddyPhatSnaps, Dapper Mr. Tom, Fabvl, Ghostlike, Jakeneutron, Kathy Chan, LongestSoloEver, Mix Williams, NemRaps, Rochelle Diamante, Rockit, The Stupendium, and Toasymarshmellow. Don't! Fret will be available on Xbox.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Don't! Fret - Official Gameplay Trailer | ID@Xbox Fall 2025 Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Launch Trailer for Battlefield REDSEC, a free-to-play first-person battle royale developed by DICE, Battlefield Studios, and EA. 

Players will duke it out across in high-octane action against 100-player lobbies to become the last team or player standing to reign victorious before the fire ring closes in. Make use of an array of weapons, equipment, and more to progress through REDSEC Challenges and the Battle Pass to earn rewards. Battlefield REDSEC is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#BattlefieldREDSEC #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlefield REDSEC - Official Gameplay Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: An asymmetrical co-op horror game set inside a cursed Victorian dollhouse? Sounds creepy; count us in! In Haunted, one player (the Supervisor) is locked inside the dollhouse and must navigate your way through – every run is different because puzzles will shift and new problems will confront you – while up to three Explorer players are locked inside the full-size Woodman Manor that holds the dollhouse. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3850670/Haunted/
title: Haunted - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Dungeon Stalkers leaves Early Access and version 1.0 is out now on Steam. Watch the Dungeon Stalkers cinematic launch trailer for this free-to-play PvEvP dungeon-crawling extraction game. Dungeon Stalkers version 1.0 features the new Mansion of Desire Dungeon, the new melee warrior Stalker Kazimorde, new insurance system: Scavenger Contract, new profile customization, new season Reputation point reward system, quality-of-life improvements, the Legendary Nave Season Skin / Twitch Drop Nave Skin, new Stalker Black Maria (available after 1 month post launch), and the raid boss: The Mimic Queen (available after 1 month post launch).
title: Dungeon Stalkers - Official Cinematic Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Launch Trailer for Wreckreation, the vehicular combat racing game developed by Three Fields Entertainment. 

Players will explore an expansive open world alone or with friends to create unique levels and race on them for victory. Wreckreation is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Wreckreation #ArcadeRacer
title: Wreckreation - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Future Saga Chapter 3 Launch Trailer for Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2, the hit 3D anime action fighting game developed by Dimps. Players will soon be able to access the Future Saga Chapter 3 DLC, packed with Broly (DB Super) and Golden Frieza (Ultra Supervillain) as playable characters. 

Get an extended look at the latest trailer for the Future Saga Chapter 3 DLC for Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2, launching on October 30 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #DragonBallZXenoverse2 #DragonBallZ
title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - Official Future Saga Chapter 3 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Beyond Episode 918, Max, Jada, and Nick talk all about their shared addiction to Ball X Pit, (is it pronounced Ball Pit or Ball X Pit?). if you havent had the chance to play it, its a highly addictive roguelike where you shoot balls at a bunch of monsters in order to get money to rebuild a town where you manage resources. Lather, rinse, repeat. If you're a fan of Vampire Survivors, Hades, Megabonk, Balatro, or any game where you need to keep trying the same thing to get better results, then this is deff worth keeping on your radar.

This weeks show was Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Nick Maillet, and is produced by Tom Jorgensen
title: PSA: Avoid Ball x Pit If You Got Too Hooked on Vampire Survivors or Balatro - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description: Introducing The Florist, a new upcoming survival horror game from developer Unclear Games that's due out for PC and consoles in 2026. You play as Jessica Park, who arrives in the small town of Joycliffe just as it descends into madness, forcing you solve puzzles and survive against rapidly evolving monstrous enemies. Wishlist The Florist on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3152440/TheFlorist/
title: The Florist - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Death By Scrolling is available now on Steam. Watch the Death By Scrolling launch trailer for another look at this roguelite game. The new Death by Scrolling trailer shows combat and creative ways to die. In Death By Scrolling, welcome to Purgatory Inc., now under new management! 

Battle your way through a vertically scrolling afterlife where every second counts, the Reaper’s on your heels, and the Ferryman refuses to offer discounts. Pick your hero, outsmart Death, and climb your way toward the world’s most expensive river crossing.

#IGN #DeathByScrolling #Action
title: Death by Scrolling - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Kickstarter Trailer for Doom: Arena and Doom: The Dark Ages Board Games, a duo of tabletop board games based on the hit video game franchise developed by Modiphius Entertainment in collaboration with id Software and Bethesda. 

Players can relive the iconic gameplay of Doom in physical format with cards to draw and statues of the Doom Slayer with his accompanying demonic adversaries. Doom: Arena and Doom: The Dark Ages Board Games are coming soon with a Kickstarter avaialble now to support the development.

#IGN #Doom #BoardGame
title: Doom: Arena and Doom: The Dark Ages Board Game - Official Kickstarter Trailer

author: IGN
description:
NASCAR 25 reviewed by Luke Reilly on Xbox Series X. Also available on Xbox Series S and PlayStation 5. PC version is coming in November 2025.

NASCAR 25 is the perfect use of iRacing’s extensive catalogue of stock car racing tracks and cars, only targeted at people who aren’t particularly interested in joining the online crucible and competing often enough to make their subscription worthwhile. As a series, it has some distance to go before it can match the breadth of other licensed racing games bringing real-world motorsport to your couch or sim rig – like F1 – but as a debut, it impresses in several key areas. If you’re after a deep multiplayer experience you may want to circle back to iRacing, but if you want some quality, single-player stock car racing against extremely solid AI, NASCAR 25 delivers.
title: NASCAR 25 Review

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Loulan: The Cursed Sand announcement trailer for this upcoming single-player action-adventure game. Dive into Loulan: The Cursed Sand's dangerous world as the reveal trailer showcases action-packed combat, formidable enemies, and more. Loulan: The Cursed Sand will be available on PC and PlayStation. 

Set in a historical fantasy theme against the backdrop of the ancient Silk Road in the Western China Regions, it tells the poignant love story of an exiled royal guard who returns to the ancient kingdom of Loulan in a turbulent era of warfare and seeks his beloved princess.

You will control the skeletal warrior known as “The Cursed Sand" and navigate a Soul-like dangerous world from a top-down perspective, using sand manipulation abilities for exploration and puzzle-solving.
title: Loulan: The Cursed Sand - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Learn the secrets to mastering your balls in this video covering 10 essential tips for success in Ball x Pit, the new breakout roguelite that has you bouncing balls, defeating enemies, creating sick combos, and even doing a little base management.
title: Ball x Pit - 10 Essential Tips Guide

author: IGN
description: Check out 'The Light Is Green' 10th Anniversary Trailer for Halo 5: Guardians, a first-person sci-fi shooter continuing the Halo series developed by Halo Studios (formerly known as 343 Industries). Players will embark on the thrilling tale of Blue Team and Fireteam Osiris as they seek to find Cortana. Take a look at the latest trailer that celebrates the 10-year anniversary of Halo 5: Guardians, available now for Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S.
title: Halo 5: Guardians - Official 10th Anniversary Trailer
